article.title: CACI Awarded Prime Position on $500 Million Multiple-Award Program with Biometrics Operations and Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: CACI International Incorporated has been awarded a prime contract to support the U.S. Army's Biometrics Task Force. CACI received one of twelve prime awards under the Biometrics Operations and Support Services - Unrestricted (BOSS-U) contract vehicle. The BOSS-U program has a total estimated ceiling value of $500 million.
